result.purpose: This folder is responsible for serving static assets and configuration files for a React.js portfolio website.
result.architecture: The folder follows a static asset architecture pattern, containing essential files for web application configuration and metadata.

public/index.html.purpose: This file serves as the main HTML document for a React.js portfolio website.
side_effects: Requires JavaScript to be enabled for the app to function.

public/manifest.json.purpose: Defines the manifest for a web application, providing metadata about the app.

public/robots.txt.purpose: This file is used to instruct web crawlers and robots about which pages they are allowed to access on the website.
